short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically labels your emails in your inbox based on how old they are.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a friendly reminder to reply or do else something with it before it's too late.

You are able to set the time it takes for an email to be put into one of the categories.
